swade-sundries.settings.reminders.enable: Show reminders in the roll dialog.
swade-sundries.settings.reminders.maxlen: The maximum number of characters before reminder text is cut off on the roll dialog.
Adds a sort button to the top of the inventory tab.
swade-sundries.settings.invfilter.enable: Adds a search field to the top of the inventory tab.
swade-sundries.settings.invsec.enabled.h: If enabled, items can be assigned custom sections for player inventories.
swade-sundries.settings.invsec.enabledcl: If enabled, items can be assigned custom inventory sections on this client.
If enabled, inventory (gear) items with SWIDs set below will be hidden from player.
swade-sundries.settings.invhide.items.hi: Comma-separated list of gear item SWIDs to hide in the inventory tab for players, if enabled above.
swade-sundries.settings.sct.players.name: Scrolling Text: Player tokens
swade-sundries.settings.sct.players.hint: Shows scrolling text configured below for player-owned tokens.
swade-sundries.settings.sct.npcs.name: Scrolling Text: NPC tokens
swade-sundries.settings.sct.npcs.hint: Shows scrolling text configured below for NPC tokens.
swade-sundries.settings.sct.showwounds.h: Shows scrolling text on Wounds changes.
swade-sundries.settings.sct.showfat.name: Scrolling Text: Fatigue
swade-sundries.settings.sct.showfat.hint: Shows scrolling text on Fatigue changes.
swade-sundries.settings.socket.enabled.h: Enable socket support (via socketlib). Only needs to be enabled if some parts of the module API are used in macros or modules. If in doubt, leave disabled.
swade-sundries.slink.itemsheet.gm.name: Link source item on item sheet (GM)
swade-sundries.slink.itemsheet.gm.hint: If an item has a compendium source item, add a header button to open it for the GM.
swade-sundries.slink.itemsheet.user.name: Link source item on item sheet (Users)
swade-sundries.slink.itemsheet.user.hint: If an item has a compendium source item, add a header button to open it for users with at least observer permissions on the compendium.
swade-sundries.slink.chatctx.name: Open Source Item via chat context menu
swade-sundries.slink.chatctx.hint: If an item has a compendium source item, add a context menu item for the item's chat cards to open it, respecting the settings above.
swade-sundries.inventory.section.label: Section
swade-sundries.chat.context.roll.convert: Are you sure you want to convert this roll to a damage roll?
